items.sentence: I can\'t believe Tom thinks I\'m a good chess player.
After the second glass of wine, Tom became talkative.
All three of my brothers are now somewhere in Boston.
Tom will be staying with us for the next three weeks.
Tom will forgive you. Just explain everything to him.
Would you please tell her to give me a call later on?
I\'m not certain what time I\'m supposed to be there.
The hallway needs to be wide enough for a wheelchair.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d left his umbrella.
Do you know those ladies who\'re getting off the bus?
